overview: Gendis and Joel, newlyweds, return from their honeymoon. They lived in the hotel for seven days. Gendis is sensitive because of menstruation. Tasya, Joel's ex-lover, congratulates him on their marriage via DM, even though his intention is to seduce Joel. It made Gendis jealous to the point of commotion. During the seven days in the hotel room they faced problems after problems that were in contrast to the atmosphere of their honeymoon in Switzerland.
title: Kopi Pahit
